mapper.select: SELECT b.id,b.name,b.start_price startPrice,b.distribution_fee distributionFee,b.img_url imgUrl from goods_cate c1 RIGHT JOIN goods_cate c2 on c1.id = c2.parent_id RIGHT JOIN goods g on g.cate_id = c2.id RIGHT JOIN business b on b.id = g.business_id where c1.name = #{cateName} GROUP BY b.name

SELECT b.id,b.name,b.start_price startPrice,b.distribution_fee distributionFee,b.img_url imgUrl from goods_cate c2 RIGHT JOIN goods g on g.cate_id = c2.id RIGHT JOIN business b on b.id = g.business_id where c2.name = #{name} GROUP BY b.name

select b.id bid,b.name bname ,g.id gid,g.name gname,g.price,g.sale_count saleCount from business b LEFT JOIN goods g on b.id = g.business_id LEFT JOIN goods_cate c2 on g.cate_id = c2.id where b.name like concat(concat("%",#{item}),"%")

select b.id bid,b.name bname ,g.id gid,g.name gname,g.price,g.sale_count saleCount from business b LEFT JOIN goods g on b.id = g.business_id LEFT JOIN goods_cate c2 on g.cate_id = c2.id where g.name like concat(concat("%",#{item}),"%") or c2.name like concat(concat("%",#{item}),"%")
